messages.content:
What are these products? Please give their names in Chinese and English.
![image](https://qianwen-res.oss-accelerate-overseas.aliyuncs.com/Qwen2.5-VL/recoAll_products.jpg)

Sure, here are the products and their Chinese and English names:
1. **Top Left Image:**
   - **English Name:** Propolinse Mouthwash
   - **Chinese Name:** 蜂胶漱口水
2. **Top Right Image:**
   - **English Name:** George Caroll Moisturizing and Refreshing Shampoo
   - **Chinese Name:** 乔治卡罗尔保湿清爽洗发水
3. **Bottom Left Image:**
   - **English Name:** On The Body Sweet Love Perfume Water
   - **Chinese Name:** 洋甘菊甜蜜爱香水
4. **Bottom Right Image:**
   - **English Name:** Tiger Balm Mosquito Repellent
   - **Chinese Name:** 虎标驱蚊水
